translations: [药] 氢化可的松；[生化] 皮质醇

sentences.sentence: The physiological action is similar to that of hydrocortisone.
sentences.translation: 生理行动与那是相似于氢化可体松。

sentences.sentence: Hydrocortisone sodium succinate (HSS) was used as a model drug.
sentences.translation: 氢化可的松琥珀酸钠(HSS)作为模型药物。

sentences.sentence: To study the effect of immunity activity of Ziqi granula on Immunodepressive mice by Hydrocortisone.
sentences.translation: 研究紫芪颗粒剂对氢化可的松致免疫低下小鼠免疫功能的影响。
